properties.title: Skills Area Nevada
properties.abstract: The centre of the Skills Area Nevada in Adelboden features an asphalt pump track and a short jump line. The mountain bike trail circling all the way around consists of various skills stations, including berms, steps and a rock garden.
properties.description:
The generous facility in the midst of the Adelboden resort is designed for recreational athletes. It is not only available to tourists who are passionate about sports, it also offers bike school training, lessons and advanced biking skills.  

The asphalt pump track is located on an area of approximately 2200 m2 and contains rollers and turns as well as a jump line with three jumps between 2 and 3 m in length. It also includes various skills stations in the form of a mountain bike trail (berms, steps, rock garden, bridges, and uphill) and a separate area to sit and stretch your legs. 


Surface area: 2200 m2
properties.name: TALK (Tourismus Adelboden-Lenk-Kandersteg) AG, Tourist Center Adelboden
